headline: Will General Mills' (GIS) R&D Investment Signal a New Phase in Its Innovation Strategy?
summary: Earlier this week, Wheaties announced that NFL quarterback Jalen Hurts will appear on its iconic orange box, while General Mills reaffirmed its fiscal 2026 earnings guidance and revealed a US$54 million expansion of its James Ford Bell Technical Center to boost product innovation. These developments underline General Mills’ ongoing commitment to brand-building through athlete partnerships and investment in research and development, positioning the company to respond to evolving consumer...
